name: Aluminum Corporation of China Limited
description: Aluminum Corporation of China Limited, also known as Chalco, is one of the largest aluminum producers in the world and a significant player in the non-ferrous metal industry. Founded in 2001 and headquartered in Beijing, China, Chalco is primarily engaged in the production and sale of alumina, primary aluminum, and aluminum products, as well as the mining and processing of bauxite. The company operates a fully integrated supply chain that spans from bauxite mining to aluminum smelting and product manufacturing. Chalco is committed to sustainability and innovation, focusing on energy-efficient production processes and the development of high-performance aluminum materials for diverse applications, including construction, transportation, and packaging. With a significant presence in both domestic and international markets, Chalco plays a vital role in meeting the growing demand for aluminum in various industries, driven by urbanization and technological advancements. The company's mission is to lead the industry in sustainable practices while delivering value to its shareholders and contributing to the development of the global aluminum market.
